alert.note: Alert for Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Meagher County Valleys; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 25 at 5:42AM MDT until March 27 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 4 inches at lower elevations, and 5 to 9 inches possible in the mountains. * WHERE...The Highwood, Little Belt, and Snowy Mountains, Judith Basin County and Judith Gap, and Meagher County Valleys. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT Sunday Night. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult at times, especially during the nighttime and morning hours, as well as over mountain passes. Those in the backcountry should ensure they have appropriate clothing for the cold and wet conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icy roads will become snow covered, making travel especially difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Meagher County Valleys; Snowy and Judith Mountains
